00029 // Constant column names.
00030 static const std::wstring GenomicPositionColName = L"Genomic Position";
00031 static const std::wstring ValueColName = L"Result";

00034 CHPTilingData::CHPTilingData()
00035 {
00036         entries = 0;
00037         Clear();
00038 }
00039 
00040 CHPTilingData::CHPTilingData(const std::string& filename) 
00041 { 
00042         entries = 0;
00043         Clear();
00044         SetFilename(filename);
00045         DataGroupHeader dcHdr(CHP_TILING_GROUP);
00046         genericData.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(dcHdr);
00047         genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->SetFileTypeId(CHP_TILING_TYPE);
00048 }
00049 
00050 void CHPTilingData::GetTilingSequenceEntry(int row, CHPTilingEntry& e)
00051 {
00052         if (entries && entries->IsOpen())
00053         {
00054                 entries->GetData(row, 0, e.position);
00055                 entries->GetData(row, 1, e.value);
00056         }
00057 }
00058 
00059 CHPTilingData::~CHPTilingData() 
00060 { 
00061         Clear(); 
00062 }
00063 
00064 void CHPTilingData::Clear()
00065 {
00066         if (entries){ entries->Delete();  entries = 0; }
00067         genericData.Header().Clear();
00068         cachedNumSequences = -1;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void CHPTilingData::SetFilename(const std::string &p)
00072 {
00073         genericData.Header().SetFilename(p);
00074 }
00075 
00076 std::string CHPTilingData::GetFilename() const
00077 {
00078         return ((GenericData&)genericData).Header().GetFilename();
00079 }
00080 
00081 int32_t CHPTilingData::GetTilingSequenceEntryCount(int index)
00082 {
00083         DataGroupHeader* dcHdr = &genericData.Header().GetDataGroup(0);
00084         DataSetHeader dpHdr = dcHdr->GetDataSet(index);
00085         return dpHdr.GetRowCnt();
00086 }
00087 
00088 void CHPTilingData::AddTilingSequenceData(int32_t numEntries, const TilingSequenceData &data)
00089 {
00090         ParameterNameValueType param;
00091         DataGroupHeader* dcHdr = &genericData.Header().GetDataGroup(0);
00092         int nSets = dcHdr->GetDataSetCnt();
00093         DataSetHeader dpHdr;
00094         dpHdr.SetRowCnt(numEntries);
00095         wchar_t name[65];
00096         FormatString1(name, 65, L"%d", nSets);
00097         dpHdr.SetName(name);
00098 
00099         param.SetName(TILING_SEQ_NAME);
00100         param.SetValueText(data.name);
00101         dpHdr.AddNameValParam(param);
00102 
00103         param.SetName(TILING_SEQ_GROUP_NAME);
00104         param.SetValueText(data.groupName);
00105         dpHdr.AddNameValParam(param);
00106 
00107         param.SetName(TILING_SEQ_VERSION);
00108         param.SetValueText(data.version);
00109         dpHdr.AddNameValParam(param);
00110 
00111         for (ParameterNameValueTypeList::const_iterator it=data.parameters.begin(); it != data.parameters.end(); it++)
00112         {
00113                 dpHdr.AddNameValParam(*it);
00114         }
00115 
00116         AddColumns(dpHdr);
00117         dcHdr->AddDataSetHdr(dpHdr);
00118 }
00119 
00120 TilingSequenceData CHPTilingData::GetTilingSequenceData()
00121 {
00122         ParameterNameValueType param;
00123         TilingSequenceData data;
00124         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt begin;
00125         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt end;
00126         if (entries && entries->IsOpen())
00127         {
00128                 const DataSetHeader &hdr = entries->Header();
00129                 hdr.GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00130                 for (ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt it=begin; it != end; it++)
00131                 {
00132                         const ParameterNameValueType &param = *it;
00133                         if (param.GetName() == TILING_SEQ_NAME)
00134                         {
00135                                 data.name = param.GetValueText();
00136                         }
00137                         else if (param.GetName() == TILING_SEQ_GROUP_NAME)
00138                         {
00139                                 data.groupName = param.GetValueText();
00140                         }
00141                         else if (param.GetName() == TILING_SEQ_VERSION)
00142                         {
00143                                 data.version = param.GetValueText();
00144                         }
00145                         else
00146                         {
00147                                 data.parameters.push_back(param);
00148                         }
00149                 }
00150         }
00151         return data;
00152 }
00153 
00154 void CHPTilingData::AddColumns(DataSetHeader& hdr)
00155 {
00156         hdr.AddUIntColumn(GenomicPositionColName);  //genomic position - unsigned int 32
00157         hdr.AddFloatColumn(ValueColName); //value - float
00158 }
00159 
00160 void CHPTilingData::OpenTilingSequenceDataSet(int index)
00161 {
00162         if (entries)
00163                 entries->Delete();
00164         entries = genericData.DataSet(0, index);
00165         if (entries)
00166                 entries->Open();
00167 }

00189 int32_t CHPTilingData::GetNumberSequences()
00190 {
00191         if (cachedNumSequences == -1)
00192                 cachedNumSequences = GetInt32FromGenericHdr(TILING_NUM_SEQS);
00193         return cachedNumSequences;
00194 }
00195 
00196 void CHPTilingData::SetNumberSequences(int32_t value)
00197 {
00198         SetInt32ToGenericHdr(TILING_NUM_SEQS, value);
00199         cachedNumSequences = value;
00200 }

00202 ParameterNameValueTypeList CHPTilingData::GetAlgParams()
00203 {
00204         const int len = (int)TILING_PARAM_SUFFIX.length();
00205         int index;
00206         ParameterNameValueType param;
00207         ParameterNameValueTypeList params;
00208         ParameterNameValueTypeIt begin;
00209         ParameterNameValueTypeIt end;
00210         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00211         hdr->GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00212         for (ParameterNameValueTypeIt it=begin; it != end; it++)
00213         {
00214                 param = *it;
00215                 index = (int) param.GetName().find(TILING_PARAM_SUFFIX);
00216                 if (index == 0)
00217                 {
00218                         param.SetName( param.GetName().substr(len, param.GetName().length()-len));
00219                         params.push_back(param);
00220                 }
00221         }
00222         return params;
00223 }
00224 
00225 void CHPTilingData::AddAlgParams(const ParameterNameValueTypeList& params)
00226 {
00227         ParameterNameValueType param;
00228         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00229         for (ParameterNameValueTypeList::const_iterator it=params.begin(); it != params.end(); it++)
00230         {
00231                 param = *it;
00232                 param.SetName(TILING_PARAM_SUFFIX + param.GetName());
00233                 hdr->AddNameValParam(param);
00234         }
00235 }
00236 
00237 std::wstring CHPTilingData::GetWStringFromGenericHdr(const std::wstring& name)
00238 {
00239         std::wstring result;
00240         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00241         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00242         if (hdr->FindNameValParam(name, paramType))
00243         {
00244                 result = paramType.GetValueText();
00245         }
00246         return result;
00247 }
00248 
00249 void CHPTilingData::SetWStringToGenericHdr(const std::wstring& name, const std::wstring value)
00250 {
00251         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00252         paramType.SetName(name);
00253         paramType.SetValueText(value);
00254         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00255         hdr->AddNameValParam(paramType);
00256 }
00257 
00258 int32_t CHPTilingData::GetInt32FromGenericHdr(const std::wstring& name)
00259 {
00260         int32_t result = 0;
00261         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00262         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00263         if (hdr->FindNameValParam(name, paramType))
00264         {
00265                 result = paramType.GetValueInt32();
00266         }
00267         return result;
00268 }
00269 
00270 void CHPTilingData::SetInt32ToGenericHdr(const std::wstring& name, int32_t value)
00271 {
00272         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00273         paramType.SetName(name);
00274         paramType.SetValueInt32(value);
00275         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00276         hdr->AddNameValParam(paramType);
00277 }
